data.title: Book "Greek Americans: Struggle and Success" by Moskos
data.meta_description: Greece genealogy. Research your Greek ancestors with historic election records, data, thousands of articles to help with your family history search.
data.text:
The Book "Greek Americans: Struggle and Success" by Charles Moskos - Second Edition was published in 1989 by Transaction Publishers.

You can view the following on the page below:

Table of Contents

and

290 names mentioned in this book

This book is available through the U.S. Inter-library loan program, you can work with your local library to obtain a copy.

-------------------------------

TABLE OF CONTENTS

CHAPTER ONE - THE GREEK COMES TO AMERICA: Beginnings and False Starts, The Era of Mass Migration

CHAPTER TWO - GREEK AMERICA FORMS: Returness and the End of Mass Migration, Disorder and Early Progress, From the Thirties to the Fifties, The New Greeks

CHAPTER THREE - THE GREEK-AMERICAN COMMUNITY: The Greek-American Population, Greek-American Institutions

CHAPTER FOUR - GREEK-AMERICAN THEMES: Across the Generations, The Greek Imagination in American Fiction, Ideology in Greek America

CHAPTER FIVE - MAKING IT IN AMERICA: Greeks in American Politics, Greeks and Restaurants: An American Phenomenon, Images of Greek Americans

CHAPTER SIX - GROWING UP GREEK AMERICAN: A FAMILY AND PERSONAL MEMOIR

CHAPTER SEVEN - THE SOCIOLOGY OF GREEK AMERICANS: Greek-American Studies: Contrasting Perspectives

CHAPTER EIGHT - GREEK AMERICA IN THE 1980s

CHAPTER NINE - POLITICS AND THE GREEK ROOTS OF MICHAEL DUKAKIS

APPENDIX - Modern Greek and Greek-American Studies, Selected Bibliography, Index

----------

290 NAMES MENTIONED IN THIS BOOK
